info.title: MIPH Shop Public API
info.description:
Public-facing API for the MIPH educational shop backend.

## Highlights
- Magic-link authentication (no passwords)
- Catalog browsing with filters and pagination
- Likes, cart sync, and checkout flows
- Consistent error envelope `{ error: { code, message, details } }`

## Conventions
- Base path: `/api/v1`
- JSON: camelCase
- Monetary fields are floats (RUB) in API responses
- Pagination: `page`, `perPage` with `total` and `totalPages`

tags.name: auth
tags.description: Magic-link authentication workflow: request link, consume token, refresh access token, and logout.

tags.name: me
tags.description: User profile endpoints for the currently authenticated user.

tags.name: catalog
tags.description: Public catalog endpoints: categories, tags, items list, item details.

tags.name: likes
tags.description: Wishlist-like endpoints for adding/removing liked items.

tags.name: cart
tags.description: Server-side cart endpoints for authenticated users, including cart merge after login.

tags.name: orders
tags.description: Checkout and order history: create order from cart, list orders, view order details, cancel, and simulate payment (dev-only).
